effect_entries.effect:
Held
:   When the holder would gain effort due to battle, it gains double that effort instead.

Held in battle
:   Holder has half its Speed.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Holder gains double effort values from battles, but has halved Speed in battle.

flavor_text_entries.text:
硬くて　重い　ギプス。
持たせると　素早さは　さがるが
ふつうより　強く　育ちやすい。

An item to be held by a Pokémon.
This stiff, heavy brace helps Pokémon
grow strong but cuts Speed in battle.

Strumento da dare a un Pokémon.
Attrezzo pesante che riduce la Velocità ma aiuta
la crescita delle statistiche.

Su lente aumenta la probabilidad que tiene el
Pokémon que lo lleva de conseguir un golpe
crítico.

Ein Item, das ein Pokémon tragen kann.
Der Initiative-Wert sinkt zwar, aber es wird
dafür umso stärker.

Objet à tenir. Un bracelet dur et lourd qui rend
le porteur plus fort, mais baisse sa Vitesse.

단단하고 무거운 깁스.
지니게 하면 스피드는 떨어지지만
여느 때보다 강하게 키우기 쉽다.

かたくて　おもい　ギプス。
もたせると　すばやさは　さがるが
ふつうより　つよく　そだちやすい。

An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is
a stiff and heavy brace that promotes
strong growth but lowers Speed.

An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is
a stiff and heavy brace that promotes
strong growth but lowers Speed.

Objet à tenir. C’est un bracelet dur
et lourd qui rend le porteur plus fort,
mais baisse sa Vitesse.

An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is
a stiff and heavy brace that promotes
strong growth but lowers Speed.

An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is

strong growth but lowers Speed.

An item to be held by a POKéMON.
It promotes strong growth but
lowers SPEED while it is held.

A hold item that
promotes growth,
but reduces SPEED.
